amendment.description: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce funding for the John E. Fogarty International Center by $95,162,000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the John E. Fogarty International Center by $95,162,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 251 (Roll no. 651).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 251 (Roll no. 651).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
